book.synopsis: This story is dated a few years after the Indian Mutiny. A party of men travel many miles in a wonderful moving house, drawn by a marvelous steam elephant. Their many adventures, and the doings of Nana Sahib, the fiend of the Mutiny and his final overthrow, are very exciting.
book.title_long: The End of Nana Sahib: The Steam House
book.dimensions: Height: 8 Inches, Length: 5 Inches, Weight: 0.54895103238 Pounds, Width: 0.69 Inches
